Translations.Text: my ne prokholodnyy vash nastriy
Ta my rozvantazhyly vash vantazh (hrikhiv)
shcho burdened vasha spyna
My exalted vy do pochesnoyi pozytsiyi
Z bolem ye pryviley
Diysno, z bolem ye pryviley
Koly zavhodno mozhlyvi vy budete doklasty zusylʹ
Shukayutʹ tilʹky vashoho Lorda
mal ta olive
Pidiymayutʹsya Sinai
Ta tse vshanovane misto (Mecca)
My utvoryly lyudynu u krashchomu proekti
Todi povernuv yoho u lowliest nyzʹko
Krim tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya; vony otrymuyutʹ vynahorodu shcho dobre zasluhovuyetʹsya
Chomu vy dosi vidkhylyayete viru
BOH ne naybilʹsh Mudryy, vsikh mudrykh
Chytayutʹ, v im'ya vashoho Lorda, khto stvoryuvav
Vin utvoryv lyudynu z embryo
Chytayutʹ, ta vash Lord, Naybilʹsh Exalted
Navchaye za dopomohoyu ruchky
Vin navchaye lyudynu yakyy vin nikoly ne znav
Diysno, lyudsʹkyy porushuye
Koly vin staye bahatym
Do vashoho Lorda yavlyaye soboyu ostatochnu dolyu
Mayete vy dyvylysya khto nakazuye
Inshi z blahayuchykh
tse ne krashche dlya nʹoho shchob sliduyutʹ za kerivnytstvom
Abo zakhyshchayutʹ righteousness
Yakshcho vin disbelieves ta prohanyaye
vin ne zdiysnyuye shcho BOH dyvytʹsya
Diysno, yakshcho ne vin utrymuyetʹsya, my vizʹmemo yoho forelock
forelock shcho disbelieving ta sinful
Dozvolyayutʹ yomu todi zaklykayutʹ yoho helpers
My zaklykayemo okhorontsiv Pekla
Vy ne budete pidkorytysya yomu; vy budete upasty prostrate ta budete prytyahnuty blyzhche
My vidkryly tse u Nochi Doli
Yak awesome yavlyaye soboyu Nich Doli
Nich Doli krashche nizh misyatsi tysyachi
anhely ta Dukh spuskayutʹsya tam, yikhnim vid'yizdom Lorda, shchob vykonaty kozhnu komandu
Myrolyubne tse ye do advent svitanku
Tsey khto disbelieved sered lyudey svyatoho pysannya, tak zhe, yak i idol worshipers, napolyahayutʹ na yikhnikh shlyakhakh, nezvazhayuchy na dokaz danyy yim
kur'yer z BOHA deklamuye yim svyashchenni instruktsiyi
U nykh ye tsinni vykladannya
Faktychno, tsey khto otrymaly svyate pysannya ne posperechavsya do dokazu davavsya yim

Vesʹ shcho buv poproshenyy z nykh musytʹ obozhnyuvaty BOHA, prysvyachuyuchy relihiyu absolyutno yomu vyklyuchno, zauvazhuyutʹ kontaktni molytvy (Salat), ta dayutʹ obov'yazkovu dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat). Takyy yavlyaye soboyu doskonalu relihiyu
Tsey khto disbelieved sered lyudey svyatoho pysannya, ta idol worshipers, zaznaly vohnyu Gehenna zavzhdy. Vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu nayhirshykh stvorinnya
Tsey khto vvazhaly ta pryviv spravedlyve zhyttya yavlyayutʹ soboyu krashchykh stvorinnya

Yikhnya vynahoroda u yikhnʹomu Lordi yavlyaye soboyu park Eden z techuchymy potokamy, prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy. BOH zadovolʹnyayetʹsya z nymy, ta vony zadovolʹnyayutʹsya z Nym. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu vynahorodu dlya tsiyeyi kotroyi povahy yikhniy Lord
Koly zemlya suvoro tremtytʹsya
Ta zemlya ejects yoho vantazhi
lyudsʹkyy bude dyvuvatysya: "Shcho vidbuvayetʹsya
Na shcho denʹ, tse kazhe yoho novynu
Shcho vash Lord nakazav tse
Na shcho denʹ, lyudy vydadutʹ z kozhnoho napryamu, shchob buty pokazani yikhni pratsi
Whoever vaha atomu harnoho pobachytʹ tse
Ta whoever vaha atomu zla pobachytʹ tse
shvydkyy gallopers
Igniting iskra
Zakhoplyuyutʹ (voroh) za dopomohoyu ranku
Razyuchyy teror tam
Pronykayutʹ do sertsya yikhnʹoyi terytoriyi
lyudsʹke isnuvannya unappreciative yoho Lorda
Vin daye svidchennya do tsʹoho faktu
Vin lyubytʹ materialʹni rechi nadmirno
